name: SMRTLogic
0:
”Alexa, ask smart logic to turn on Zone 1 for 5 minutes”
”Alexa, open smart logic”
”Alexa, launch smart logic”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: smart logic
Developer Terms of Use
des: Now you can control your landscape irrigation and outdoor lighting with Alexa. Compatible irrigation controllers from Toro® and Irritrol® equipped with a SMRT Logic™ Gateway provide effortless control of your irrigation for watering needs maintenance to help you maintain a healthy landscape. In addition, the SMRT Logic™ Gateway can control landscape lighting from Unique Lighting Systems® as well as other landscape features like fountains, holiday lights, and security gates which unifies the relationship between your home and the landscape that surrounds it.
